p: The occurrence records of R. roxellana ( N = 1,225) comprised data from standard monitoring activities by the staff of the SNJ National Park from May to December 2013, camera‐trap monitoring data and the published literature (Luo et al., 2015; Su et al., 2004). To diminish the impact of spatial autocorrelation, we filtered multiple records by randomly selecting one record in a 1 km × 1 km grid cell. A total of 234 occurrence records were used in this study (Figure 1).
